org.jcvi.jillion.profile

Interface ProfileWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface ProfileWriter
extends Closeable
    ProfileWriter
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSequence(int startOffset, NucleotideSequence sequence)
      Add the given sequence to this profile.
      void close()
      Close the writer and flush all data to the output.

    • Method Detail

      • addSequence

        void addSequence(int startOffset,
                 NucleotideSequence sequence)
        Add the given sequence to this profile.
        Parameters:
        startOffset - the start offset (0-based) that this reads starts relative to the provided reference; must be >=0 and <= reference length - sequence length.
        sequence - the sequence to add; can not be null and length must be <= reference length - start offset.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if sequence is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if startOffset or any adjusted position in the sequence is beyond the range of the provided reference.

      • close

        void close()
    throws IOException
        Close the writer and flush all data to the output.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Throws:
        IOException
